name: @liquid-labs/go-rest
description: Toolbox for REST-ful APIs including paging, search, and standardized responses.

scripts.prepare: npm run build && cd rest && go test all
scripts.show-coverage: cd nulls && go test -coverprofile=coverage.out && go tool cover -html=coverage.out

author: Zane Rockenbaugh <zane@liquid-labs.com>
